examples: The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Good wine can make a meal.
The news really made my day.
words.defineEn: to represent someone or something in a particular way
words.defineVi: để đại diện cho một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trong một cách cụ thể

examples: On the face of it, his suggestion makes sense.
Thanks for the pearl of wisdom, buddy, but your suggestion is ridiculous.
Could I make a suggestion?
She made the suggestions entirely off her own bat.
A CEO may receive helpful suggestions from the least experienced employee, as even a mouse may help a lion.
words.defineEn: the act of putting an idea or plan forward for someone to think about or consider
words.defineVi: hành động đưa ra một ý tưởng hoặc kế hoạch để ai đó suy nghĩ hoặc xem xét

examples: The food looks good.
Good wine can make a meal.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
This information is as good as gold.
"Your guess is as good as mine."
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is satisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng thỏa mãn

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
The weather was disagreeably hot.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
The bad weather brought famine.
Good afternoon, the weather is perfect for a walk.
words.defineEn: the temperature and other atmospheric conditions such as sunshine, rain, wind, etc.
words.defineVi: nhiệt độ và các điều kiện khí quyển khác như nắng, mưa, gió, v.v.

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
The bad weather brought famine.
Don’t use bad language.
Bad manners will get you nowhere.
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is unsatisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng không thỏa mãn

examples: The movie was as boring as they come.
It’s so boring, eating the same food day in, day out.
I have to do the same boring jobs day in day out.
The child nodded off to sleep during the boring lecture.
This course seemed right up my alley when I signed up for it, but it ended up being dreadfully boring.
words.defineEn: making us feel tired and unsatisfied because of not being interesting
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy mệt mỏi và không hài lòng vì không thú vị

examples: The weather was disagreeably hot.
The news came hot on the heels of another plane crash.
The factory closure follows hot on the heels of several others
The winter issue is hot off the press.
That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
words.defineEn: having a high temperature or a high degree of heat
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao hoặc nhiệt độ cao

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: The beach is a mile away.
We spent the day at the beach.
We packed our beach bag with sunscreen, towels, and beach toys.
She painted her toenails a vibrant shade of red for the beach vacation.
I always have a good time at the beach.
words.defineEn: an area of sand or small stones next to the sea or a lake
words.defineVi: một khu vực cát hoặc đá nhỏ bên cạnh biển hoặc hồ

examples: She made coffee for us all.
The coffee in the mug was a dark.
The coffee table was a dark wood color.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
words.defineEn: a drink that is made from mixing water with some crushed seeds, called coffee beans, usually hot and brown in color
words.defineVi: một thức uống được làm từ nước trộn với một số hạt nghiền nhỏ, được gọi là hạt cà phê, thường nóng và có màu nâu

examples: The café served a delicious breakfast sandwich with eggs, cheese, and ham on a toasted bagel.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
The café served a variety of coffee drinks, including cappuccino and macchiato.
She discovered a new café in the neighborhood.
words.defineEn: a small restaurant that sells drinks and meals
words.defineVi: một nhà hàng nhỏ bán đồ uống và bữa ăn

examples: They coated their chicken nuggets with sesame seeds.
She coated the pork ribs with a generous amount of piri-piri marinade.
Her right leg was coated in plaster.
The wind had coated everything with a layer of sand.
take your coat off.
words.defineEn: a piece of clothing with long sleeves, worn outdoors and over other clothes to keep warm or dry
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo có tay dài, mặc ngoài trời và bên ngoài quần áo khác để giữ ấm hoặc khô

examples: The woman hit the mugger with her umbrella.
I forgot my umbrella, and now I'm getting wet in the rain.
I carried an umbrella with me because the weather looked cloudy.
Sorry, I forgot to bring my umbrella.
Don't forget to take your umbrella - it's raining cats and dogs out there.
words.defineEn: an object with a circular folding frame covered in cloth, used as protection against rain or hot sun
words.defineVi: một vật có khung gấp hình tròn được bọc vải, dùng để che mưa nắng
